task.title: Design proposal - procedure
task.shortdesc: The Landscape Design Plan and Irrigation Design Plan are to be thoroughly checked by City. Staff for substantial compliance with the criteria contained in this document; the Landscape. Design Plan shall be in substantial conformity with the Preliminary Landscape Design Plan.

context.p: Most landscape design proposals will require a two-step review process as described below

step.cmd: Design Review approval of Preliminary Landscape Design Plan.
Plan Check approval of Landscape Design Plan and Irrigation Design Plan.
